1.title: Zwanger
1.plot: Renske breaks Danny's heart by deciding not to move back in. Instead of staying with her parents, as she told him, she lets Gio seduce her to his place. Italo orders Solange to work off the fat she put on since their wedding, but she fakes dieting and carries on eating. Diego actually only pretended to be in a coma, but his selfish mother is ready for euthanasia- until aunt Madonna returns from Singapore.

2.title: Leven en dood
2.plot: Danny is back on the team and presents his new girlfriend Kate to the press, but she fears she is not to be cut out for public life and reminders of his past. Both hate finding out Renske stayed in town and is now living with Gio. A row in the locker-room after a lost match gets Danny suspended. Diego now pretends to be mute and disabled now that he's no longer comatose, so he's released home, where his mother arrogantly refuses help from aunt Madonna or the professional nurse. Italo still demands that Solange takes dieting seriously. Her pooch Dushi runs in front of ...

3.title: Oude bekende
3.plot: Now would-be-model Kate is back with Danny, he agrees to help Gio gain legal paternity over Levi and divorce Renske. But she guesses Gio doesn't love her and wants to move back home. That makes both men change their positions. Jeffrey has appointed Madonna administrator of Diego's trust, and refuses to divorce Melanie unless she signs over the boy. Solange's reconstructive and plastic surgery is an aesthetic success.

4.title: Op z'n russisch
4.plot: Danny lets lover Kate move in. Alex Largo, from her past, pretends to offer her a movie part, in fact as blackmail with her porn past. Solange believes her dad Ton is terminally ill. Italo accepts to grant his 'dying wish': a grandson. Melanie can no longer pay her bills, so she desperately presses Jokke for a commission on African player Kofi's discovery. FC Heros is bought by Russian heir Oleg Ikolajev. His haughty Ukrainian-Dutch self-made wife Oksana expects to become the wives' top-dog, which broke Melanie has to accept, until Oleg threatens with foreign ...

5.title: De ontmaskering
5.plot: Oleg Ikolajev announces he's making an Arctic expedition and leaves his wife Oksana in charge as Heros's 'club president', to coach Carolus's horror. She gets him drinking vodka, but he and the team fight trough. Diego's grandpa Dirk Duprie turns up, telling he's terminally ill and sold his French vineyard. Madonna gets landed with him. The boy discovers never knew him, ma's doing, according to her because he's abusive. Mikey presents his bride Roswita, who tells Solange she's bi and 'interested'. Kate pays blackmailer Alex, but not enough. She steals evidence he ...

6.title: Vader
6.plot: Kate assures Danny her past is no longer a problem. Oksana's cheap past is aired on TV. The police arrests Alex, but he posted the crucial images on Internet. Danny stands by Kate, but the stress makes him try cocaine. Oksana brings in Boshoi ballet coach, Yoeri, to teach the soccer team 'dancing with the ball', in which Gio excels. After Solange confesses her lesbian kiss with Roswita to Italo, he claims that trust breach calls for a compensatory threesome in a spa. Solange however tricks Mikey to catch has unfaithful bride. Madonna's lies to keep Melanie apart from ...

7.title: Creatief denken
7.plot:

8.title: Geld
8.plot: Danny agonized about facing the press, even worse after Italo's flippant advice, but once Kate shivers in front of the TV reporter Danny spontaneously radiates love and confidence in her. Alas Danny got badly addicted to cocaine and nightlife, and Kate is onto it. Madonna moves Diego's things, tells him Melanie no longer wants to see him and keeps them apart in every way she can. Solange discovers Italo keeps their savings cash and asks Mikey's 'family crime expertise' to work out a 'better' stash then the safe but comes up with even worse and gets paranoia. Oksana ...

9.title: Ontvoerd
9.plot: Danny's cocaine use only worsened when Kate moved out, but they promise each-other a clean break when she returns, but have a row when she finds another sachet. When Danny takes his frustrations out on the field and coach, Oxana sides with Carolus, who suspends Danny. Madonna keeps pushing Diego to call her mama and isolates him at home. When she forces him to wear girlish clothes, he runs away. Oxana has fallen for Gio's charms, so they must rush him out when Oleg arrives back from the Artic early. Solange's dumb hiding plans have ended up loosing Italo's cash stash ...

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Danny can't remember if he raped stewardess Lisa while stoned. Kate doubts him, but studies an incriminating Internet video and proves she seduced him. Oksana discovers Solange is one of Oleg's kidnappers. She accepts to pay- to keep him prisoner so she can continue her adultery with Gio, who demands she makes up her mind. Diego discovers Madonna is on psychotherapeutic pills and mistakes him for her late baby girl Daphne.

11.title: Voorzorgen
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Oost west, thuis best
12.plot: Kate looks like she'll beat Melanie easily at the Dutch national soccer gala's style award, but instead opts out of 'senseless' modeling altogether. Oleg is so besotted with Solange that instead of revenge for his kidnapping, he wants to marry her. Italo refuses to sell her, but in order to be free for lover Gio, Ilana comes up with an alternative: find another wife for him. The Russian she and Solange select does badly, actually looking for an au pair-position, but Mikey's visit with his new girl-friend changes things.

13.title: De bedreigde bruid
13.plot: A Real Madrid scout is so impressed with Danny he actually places a generous bid. Kate however is dead-set on starting charity working Africa. Italo's Chinese adoptive child, Li Hai, arrives. Now he tells Solange he changed the request from baby girl to - boy, which they rename Angelo. He bribes her by pointing out she can thus shop all over for him. Alas her maternal incompetence is obvious even to Mel, who hires an urchin to mind the baby. Gio challenges Oskana to a bit she can't abstain form shopping a week. Tempted by a gown, she shoplifts it and is arrested. ...

14.title: Episode #3.14
14.plot: Even Danny's angelic patience doesn't stretch to letting Kate spend a while year in a godforsaken Ghanan village rather then his new luxury villa near Madrid. Gio discovers how Oksana plans to 'earn her keep' when a reality TV camera team films him getting out of bed stark-naked and sticks to them at home every second. Solange wants to keep 'foundling' Bonnie rather then legally adopted Angelo. Melanie grudgingly accepts to convert to Catholicism to become Kofi's wife, but not his Ghanan bride carrying Diego's baby.

1.title: Het geheim
1.plot: The unpopular coach Arjan Reitsma is buried. The soccer wives keep wining, dining, shopping and plotting. The interim coach, former Heros star player Jeffrey Woesthoff, has no authority, the players just waste time. Italo is determined to be faithful even before marriage, so he turns away horny adoring fans and interviews prospective cleaning ladies solely by the criterion utterly unattractive, hiring old bag Désirée, alas a bad and annoying cleaner. Bossy bad mother Mel is jealous of her own sister Madonna, who is liked by husband Jeffrey and sons Dylan and Diego. ...

2.title: Vechten voor geluk
2.plot: Danny is a furious wreck now the knee-injury from Italo's mean kick won't heal at least six weeks, Rutger tries to rein in the beast, then takes him along to convince Danny not to sue, even gets them to shake hands, but privately warns Italo he won't get off easily if there is a next time, he can better let off steam, apparently excess sexual energy since he became monogamous. Jeffrey overhears two wives tell how they caused Arjab's death and tells Mel he wants out of Heros, even if she won't follow him to Bahrein; eldest son Dylan is understanding and hopes to enjoy ...

3.title: Twee moeders
3.plot: While Italo's maid Desiree is sick, her rather attractive daughter Romy fills in- even more aggro as she hovers during their bed sex; he wants her out, wife Solange insists good help is hard to find but has her brother Mickey set up cameras so the whole bitches club can spy his fidelity test, but she only notices her pet dog Dushi's hair-loss, supposedly a jealousy symptom, and holds off sex, so he hits the dirty Internet. Poor Danny's knee heals torturously slow, he has has to watch how his external stand-in Gio Goudzand is an instant hit, but at least he can spend ...

4.title: Geld maakt niet gelukkig
4.plot: Danny's revalidation is torturous, constantly being bossed around by professionals, strict diet and even monitored in bed. Ignorant of the camera's, Italo finally does the sexy maid, Solonge confers with her ma about revenge... Dylan was suckered into dating a hooker, Nikkie, but they really hook-on. Jealous of her sister Melanie, selfish mother Melanie Woesthoff makes kid son Diego accompany her Heros club song on the keyboard, but gets drunk and hoarse on the day in the stadium. Rutger is falling for Liz, but doubts if she digs him or just his signature to release ...

5.title: Liefde is meer dan seks
5.plot:

6.title: Begin van het einde
6.plot: Dylan finds 'manager' step-ma Melanie too drunk -even the other wives suggest the lush should consider seeking help- to remember she was to pick up kid bro Diego; alas he can find no cab and is badgered in the club all day, and he has craps... Keeper Max has been sold, his successor is Hidde Storm. Renske is pissed off to find dear husband Danny asked his physiotherapist back, he when she entertains Gio, his replacement in the club; when Danny can't stand watching the team playing a beach tournament she organized in his name, she declares Gio the winner and is kissed ...

9.title: De smaak van wraak
9.plot: Danny suspects and soon finds proof gold-digger Irma milks his wife Renske for the negligible damage she incurred in a car accident; once cut off, Irma confronts Renske, causing a -false- pregnancy complication alarm. Liz's rich dream prince baron Oberon van Ravenzwaai keeps pulling the romantic luxury stops in his castle, but no sex- that night. Mel isn't cooperating in drug rehab clinic, but is assured Jeffrey's Bahrein liaison was a press figment. Despite a generous new mobile-home, ingrate Solange forces fiancé Italo to 'apologize' to her deadbeat family, who ...

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Renske still resists Gio's insistence to tell Danny the truth about the seven months old pregnancy, then realizes finding out after the birth would be unforgivable; Danny was so happy to become a dad, but learning the truth wants nothing to d with her, regardless if he's the biological father; when Danny attacks Gio, who wants no paternal part either way anyhow, ... Now Italo has solved Solange's refusal to be married without her dad by wedding mulatto Tessa, actually Carolus's daughter, who impulsively accepted to substitute for the bride, who nevertheless stays in ...

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Mel completely neglects the Woesthoff household now youngest son Diego has left, despite a letter from Jeffrey the boy has arrived safely in Bahrein with his dad, who intends to send him back once calmed down. Hearing from the other wives he's bunking with Hidde, Mel goes to his hotel suite, and sees another girl ordered to whip him harder in bed. The Heros president is arrested in the Chinese gambling corruption investigation; coach Carolus crushes corrupt Hidde's hand. Now Danny has rejected her, Renske refuses to see the other possible father, Gio. Just because ...

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Even on crutches just after his horrible fall, Danny rushed home to be with Renske while they wait for the police to find their kidnapped baby Levi, a 1,000,000 Euro ransom is demanded within a day. Italo expects 'joke wife' Tessa to disappear from his life, when she refuses blocks her credit-car, Solange counts on reverse psychology; even daddy Rutger's advice to annul is ignored. Melanie shares in Hidde's glory now justice can't sue him, Jokke remains arrested, the team loses ten points: season ruined. Dylan can't stay with the traitor, so Italo takes him in. Danny ...

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Sweet Denny proves a proud and tender daddy for baby Levi, even bathes with him, eager to spot physical resemblances, but Gino turns up with pictures and the horrible truth skin-darkening with age will become impossible to deny.... Italo nearly calls the 'real' wedding off as bride Solange keeps adding demands and absurdities, but when she's off to spend the eve in ma's mobile-home the grumbling groom gets an uninvited visit from her pa and brother, who drag him away from his promise to have no stag-night, so he'll not only turn up late and drunk but barely make it ...

imdb.plot outline: [Season 1] This Dutch version of "Soccer wives" follows several hot footballers of Heros, an Amsterdam top team and their family lives. Star player Italo Ferrero's fiancée Solange is used to being materially spoiled rotten by her gorgeous and horny stallion, but also put in her subordinate place; she covers for her fat brother Mikey, a robber, but Italo finds out and forbids any contact with her bothersome trailer-family. Newcomer Danny Doornbos' steady partner -soon married, under national press coverage to pay for his unfortunate gambling attempts- Renske Veldman wasn't prepared at all for life in the big league -he's no longer an available 'husband' on call- nor for the perks of his high income... Top scorer Jeffrey Woesthoff's wife Melanie uses her female charms to 'persuade' the club chairman in his office to keep hubby on a good spot; their son Dylan proves early maturity- in bed... Coach Arjan Duivendrecht's wife Liz demands he keeps his promise to stop now, after 20 years and help her start a manège in Spain, but as a compromise he buys one in Holland, plus a thoroughbred and studly stable-hand Damian, who must also compensate Arjan's inability to satisfy her sexually; she discovers later Arjan is actually a closet transvestite, alas the press does too, the players ax him, he hangs himself on a goal post and is succeeded by the generally feared Harry Reitsma, who dies in a car accident, which seems arranged, allegedly by three of the soccer wives...
imdb.title: Voetbalvrouwen

production companies.name: Nijenhuis & de Levita Film & TV B.V.

plot: Four Dutch soccer stars' wives stand by their man, as his success determines her life and some's children's. But often they rather complicate all their lives.::Anonymous

[Season 1] This Dutch version of "Soccer wives" follows several hot footballers of Heros, an Amsterdam top team and their family lives. Star player Italo Ferrero's fiancée Solange is used to being materially spoiled rotten by her gorgeous and horny stallion, but also put in her subordinate place; she covers for her fat brother Mikey, a robber, but Italo finds out and forbids any contact with her bothersome trailer-family. Newcomer Danny Doornbos' steady partner -soon married, under national press coverage to pay for his unfortunate gambling attempts- Renske Veldman wasn't prepared at all for life in the big league -he's no longer an available 'husband' on call- nor for the perks of his high income... Top scorer Jeffrey Woesthoff's wife Melanie uses her female charms to 'persuade' the club chairman in his office to keep hubby on a good spot; their son Dylan proves early maturity- in bed... Coach Arjan Duivendrecht's wife Liz demands he keeps his promise to stop now, after 20 years and help her start a manège in Spain, but as a compromise he buys one in Holland, plus a thoroughbred and studly stable-hand Damian, who must also compensate Arjan's inability to satisfy her sexually; she discovers later Arjan is actually a closet transvestite, alas the press does too, the players ax him, he hangs himself on a goal post and is succeeded by the generally feared Harry Reitsma, who dies in a car accident, which seems arranged, allegedly by three of the soccer wives...::KGF Vissers
